name: GoSweetSpot Shipping Options
author: GoSweetSpot

sections.description:
Setting shipping options for your shopper’s checkout can be a complex and difficult task.

We’re here to help.

  • Define rules based on shopping cart value, weight of products in the cart, or simply mark up your current rates.
  • Apply surcharges for residential or outer area (rural) deliveries as validated by us based on the address.
  • Offer multiple shipping options to your customers.
  • We take care of managing the shipping zones for you. You simply select the zone and set your rules.

After installing GoSweetSpot Shipping Options plugin, you will be able to enable Carrier and App Rates for your checkout workflow. This can be used to complement your existing shipping matrix or replace it.

How does it work?

The shipping cost is calculated online using GoSweetSpot API, so your clients will see all matched shipping options available under your GoSweetSpot account in the checkout with its pricing.
sections.faq:
Where can I find documentation?

For setting up and configuring, please refer to GoSweetSpot Shipping Options App and GoSweetSpot Shipping Options App (WooCommerce Installation).

Do I need a GoSweetSpot account?

Yes. GoSweetSpot Shipping Options plugin use the identifier and secret to make connection to the API. Sign up with GoSweetSpot easily on our site.
sections.changelog:
0.1.6 – 2024-05-15

  • Add support for woocommerce-gateway-stripe

0.1.5 – 2023-09-04

  • Declaring extension compatibility with WC HPOS

0.1.4 – 2023-07-18

  • Update Weight and CartPrice field to reduce confusion

0.1.3 – 2023-07-03

  • Fix build pipeline base url issue.

0.1.2 – 2023-06-30

  • Fix Tested Version.

0.1.1 – 2023-06-14

  • Bug fix for shipping worldwide to countries without postcode.

0.1.0 – 2022-10-05

  • First release!

short_description: Realtime address validated shipping options for your customers.
